content:
During the last day, Russian troops fired at the territory of 11 regions of Ukraine.

About thisinformsMilitary Media Center with reference to information of the Situation Center of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine.

In general, Russian troops were beaten in areas from different types of weapons - mortars, tanks, artillery, RSZV, SDR, OTRC, UAV and tactical aviation.

145 settlements and 98 infrastructure sites were attacked.

There are killed and injured among civilians, the number of victims is clarified.

As reported by the Armyinform, during the last day the Russian armyThey were struck299 beats on 12 settlements of Zaporizhzhya region.
title: Over the past day, Russian troops fired 145 settlements and 98 infrastructure sites
description: About it reports Military Media Center with reference to information of the situational center ...
author: Army Inform
